name: Icarus M: Guild War VELZEROTH
description: VEL(VELZEROTH) is a digital asset linked to the WEMIX blockchain platform and the game token representing the mobile P&E MMORPG, ICARUS M: GUILD WAR. Players can cast VEL with in-game currency SC(Scale Crystal) and exchange VEL for in-game currency DS(Dragon Scale) in-game DS exchange. Players can enjoy the various game contents and purchase items by producing and consuming P&E currencies like DS, SC, and VEL in the game.
